•         Tunstill Square – New power supply and flood upgrades

•         New street light at rear Rothesay Road 
•         New street light at rear Railway Terrace

DELIVERY OF THE PENDLE BUSINESS AWARDS 2018.

£5,643 + VAT ON OR AROUND 1ST MAY
£5,643 + VAT ON OR AROUND 1ST JUNE
*£5,644.25 + VAT ON OR AROUND 5TH JULY

TOTAL = £16,930.25 + VAT

* THE FINAL BALANCE INVOICE WILL BE ADJUSTED TO REFLECT THE FINAL BUDGET AS RECONCILIATION, AS TICKET SALES / EVENT COSTS WILL VARY SLIGHTLY.
